code: import React from"react";import RecipeCard from"../../components/RecipeCard/RecipeCard";import useProtectedPage from"../../hooks/useProtectedPage";import{RecipeListContainer,AddRecipeButton}from"./styled";import useRequestData from"../../hooks/useRequestData";import{BASE_URL}from"../../constants/urls";import{Add}from'@material-ui/icons';import{goToAddRecipes,goToRecipeDetail}from'../../routes/coordinator';import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import Loading from"../../components/Loading/Loading";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var RecipesListPage=function RecipesListPage(){useProtectedPage();var Navigate=useNavigate();var recipes=useRequestData([],"".concat(BASE_URL,"/recipe/feed"));var onClickCard=function onClickCard(id){goToRecipeDetail(Navigate,id);};var recipeCards=recipes.map(function(recipe){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RecipeCard,{title:recipe.title,image:recipe.image,onClick:function onClick(){return onClickCard(recipe.recipe_id);}},recipe.recipe_id);});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(RecipeListContainer,{children:[recipeCards.length>0?recipeCards:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Loading,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AddRecipeButton,{color:"primary",onClick:function onClick(){return goToAddRecipes(Navigate);},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Add,{})})]});};export default RecipesListPage;
